data.enText: to change or make sth change from one form, purpose, system, etc. to another

data.chText: 那家旅馆将被改建成私人疗养院。
data.enText: The hotel is going to be converted into a nursing home.

data.chText: 如果我把美元兑换成欧元，汇率是多少？
data.enText: What rate will I get if I convert my dollars into euros?

data.chText: 我们已经把中央供热系统由燃油改成了燃气。
data.enText: We've converted from oil to gas central heating.
to be able to be changed from one form, purpose, or system to another
a sofa that converts into a bed

data.chText: （使）改变（宗教或信仰）；（使）皈依，归附
data.enText: to change or make sb change their religion or beliefs

data.chText: 他由基督教改信伊斯兰教。
data.enText: He converted from Christianity to Islam.

data.chText: 她不久便转而献身于社会主义事业了。
data.enText: She was soon converted to the socialist cause.
to change an opinion, a habit, etc.
I've converted to organic food.

data.chText: 我过去不喜欢歌剧，但我丈夫改变了我。
data.enText: I didn't use to like opera but my husband has converted me.

data.chText: （在持球触地或持球越过对方球门线得分后）获得附加分
data.enText: to score extra points after a try , or a touchdown
preach to the converted

data.chText: 向教徒宣教；教读书人写大字
data.enText: to speak to people in support of views that they already hold

data.chText: 改变宗教（或信仰、观点）的人；皈依者
data.enText: a person who has changed their religion, beliefs or opinions
a convert to Islam

data.chText: 来自其他宗教信仰的皈依者
data.enText: converts from other faiths

data.chText: 一位转而支持这项事业的人
data.enText: a convert to the cause

simple_means.memory_skill: con 加强 + vert 转 → 转化

means: 改变宗教(或信仰、观点)的人

ex.chText: 女巫把那男孩变成了一只老鼠。
ex.enText: A witch changed the boy into a mouse.

ex.chText: 经济形势已发生了相当大的变化。
ex.enText: The economic situation has changed considerably.
The leaves on the trees change colour in the autumn.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，可指任何变化，强调与原先的情况有明显的不同。

ex.chText: 你的外衣太大了，得找人改一下。
ex.enText: Your coat is too big. You must have it altered.

ex.chText: 工作环境必须改善，以适应新的要求。
ex.enText: The working condition must be altered to meet the new requirements.

synonyms.bx: 常指轻微改变，强调在保持原状的情况下进行局部改变。

ex.chText: 请把这钱兑换成人民币。
ex.enText: Please convert this money into RMB.
Her mother has converted to Catholicism.

synonyms.bx: 指改变形式、用途、使用方式等，也指改变信仰、观点、态度等。

ex.chText: 这项计划要用就必须修改。
ex.enText: The plan must be modified if it is to be used.

ex.chText: 你最好说得和缓些才是。

synonyms.bx: 指对某物作细小的改动以对其进行改进，使其更适用或更高效。

ex.chText: 魔术师把那条手帕变成了一只鸟。
ex.enText: The magician transformed the handkerchief into a bird.

ex.chText: 太阳能可以转化为能量。
ex.enText: Solar energy can be transformed into power.

synonyms.bx: 指在形式、外观、性质等方面彻底改变，即成为全新的东西。

ex.enText: Coal can be turned into heat.

ex.chText: 他把这本小说变成了英语畅销书。
ex.enText: He turned this novel into an English best-seller.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指外形、颜色、气味、性质等方面发生变化。

ex.chText: 鱼的价格随着市场行情而变化。
ex.enText: The prices of fish vary according to market conditions.

ex.chText: 老年人不喜欢改变他们的习惯。
ex.enText: Old people don't like to vary their habits.

synonyms.bx: 指根据某一情况的变化而变化，也指更改某事物。

data.enText: preach to the converted

data.chText: 向教徒宣教；教读书人写大字
data.enText: to speak to people in support of views that they already hold

tr: a person who has been converted to another religious or political belief
change in nature, purpose, or function
example: The substance converts to an acid

tr: change the nature, purpose, or function of something
exchange or replace with another, usually of the same kind or category
example: Could you convert my dollars into pounds?

tr: exchange a penalty for a less severe one
change from one system to another or to a new plan or policy
change religious beliefs, or adopt a religious belief
cause to adopt a new or different faith
example: The missionaries converted the Indian population

tr: make (someone) agree, understand, or realize the truth or validity of something
example: He had finally convinced several customers of the advantages of his product
score a penalty shot or free throw

tr: score an extra point or points after touchdown by kicking the ball through the uprights or advancing the ball into the end zone
example: Smith converted and his team won

value.boxr_value: The verb is pronounced /kən'vɜːt/. The noun is pronounced /'kɒnvɜːt/. 动词读作 /kən'vɜːt/，名词读作 /'kɒnvɜːt/。

value.def: If one thing is converted or converts into another, it is changed into a different form.

example.ex: The signal will be converted into digital code.
example.tran: 信号会被转变为数字代码。

example.ex: ...naturally occurring substances which the body can convert into vitamins.
example.tran: 自然产生的能被身体转化成维生素的物质

example.ex: ...a table that converts into an ironing board.
example.tran: 能转换成熨衣板的桌子

value.def: If someone converts a room or building, they alter it in order to use it for a different purpose.

example.ex: By converting the loft, they were able to have two extra bedrooms.
example.tran: 把阁楼改造一下，他们就可以多出两间卧室。

example.ex: ...the entrepreneur who wants to convert County Hall into an hotel...
example.tran: 想把市政厅改建成旅馆的企业家

example.ex: He is living in a converted barn.
example.tran: 他住在一个改造过的仓库里。

value.def: If you convert a vehicle or piece of equipment, you change it so that it can use a different fuel.

example.ex: Save money by converting your car to unleaded...
example.tran: 将车改装一下，使用无铅汽油，这样可以省钱。

example.ex: The programme to convert every gas burner in Britain took 10 years.
example.tran: 完成对英国所有煤气灶的改造花了10年时间。

value.def: If you convert a quantity from one system of measurement to another, you calculate what the quantity is in the second system.

example.ex: Converting metric measurements to U.S. equivalents is easy.
example.tran: 将公制计量换算成美制计量非常简单。

value.def: If someone converts you, they persuade you to change your religious or political beliefs. You can also say that someone converts to a different religion.

example.ex: If you try to convert him, you could find he just walks away...
example.tran: 如果你试图改变他的信仰，他就会走开。

example.ex: He was a major influence in converting Godwin to political radicalism...
example.tran: 戈德温变成政治激进主义者主要是受他的影响。

value.tran: (使)改变宗教（或政治）信仰;(使)皈依;(使)归附

value.def: A convert is someone who has changed their religious or political beliefs.

example.ex: She, too, was a convert to Roman Catholicism.
...a Muslim convert now known as Yusuf Islam.
example.tran: 现以优素福·伊斯兰这个名字为大家熟知的伊斯兰教皈依者

value.tran: 皈依者;归附者;改变信仰者

value.def: If someone converts you to something, they make you very enthusiastic about it.

example.ex: He quickly converted me to the joys of cross-country skiing.
example.tran: 他很快就使我迷上了越野滑雪。

value.def: If you describe someone as a convert to something, you mean that they have recently become very enthusiastic about it.

example.tran: 最近开始热衷于素食主义的人

value.tran: 刚迷上…的人;最近开始热衷于…的人

partsOfSpeech.dec: ad 加强 + vers 转 + ary 表人 → 逆反之人 → 对手
ad 做… + vers 转 + e → 一再转 → 逆反的
anni 年 + vers 转 + ary 物 → 一年转一次 → 周年纪念日
a 不 + vers 转 + e →〔反对〕不转 → 反对的
a 不 + vers 转 + ion 表名词 → 反感
a 加强 + vert 转 → 不停转 → 避开
contro 相反 + vert 转 → 反着转 → 反驳
con 共同 + vers 转 + ant …的 → 在一起转的 → 亲近的
con 共同 + vers 转 + e →〔两个齿轮对着〕一起转 → 相反的
con 共同 + vers 转 + ion 表名词 → 转化；（宗教的）改变
con 加强 + vert 转 → 转化
di 分开 + vers 转 + e → 转开了 → 不同的
di 分开 + vers 转 + ify 使… → 多样化
di 分开 + vers 转 + ion 表名词 → 转向；娱乐
di 分开 + vert 转 → 转开 → 使转向
in 不 + controvert 反驳 + ible …的 → 不容反驳的 → 不容争论的
in 不 + convert 转化 + ible 可…的，能…的；具有…性质的 → 不能转化的
in 进入 + vers 转 + e → 转进去 → 翻转的
mal 坏 + vers 转 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 转坏了 → 做官变坏 → 贪污
per 自始至终 + vers 转 + e → 自始至终〔反着〕转 → 性情乖张的
per 自始至终 + vert 转 → 自始至终地转 → 颠倒
re 相反 + vers 转 + e → 反着转 → 颠倒
re 回 + vert 转 → 转回来 → 恢复原状
re 回 + vers 转 + ion 表名词 → 恢复原状
trans 横过 + vers 转 + al …的 → 横着转 → 横断的
uni 一个 + vers 转 + e → 统一旋转 → 宇宙
uni 一个 + vers 转 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 由宇宙引申为知识，知识之地 → 大学
vers 转 + atile → 玩得转 → 多才的
vers 转 + e 婉转的话 → 诗歌
vers 转 + ion 表名词 → 从原文转换过来 → 译文
vert 转 + igo → 转着走 → 眩晕
